definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">On player tick update</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"/><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:AWP</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_negate"><value name="BOOL"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isscope</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isscope</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:isscope</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
